name: super-cursor
description: A superset of commands to improve multi-cursor workflow

cursorDecoration.title: Decoration of the last cursor
cursorDecoration.description: The main cursor is marked with special CSS when the number of cursors is more than two.

decorationTime.title: Time to disappear cursor decoration
decorationTime.description: Set the time in ms after which decoration disappears. If the timer is set to zero, the decoration is permanent.
